California Super Bloom: The Poppies

Antelope Valley California Poppy Reserve

Lindsay Linegar
Apr 2

California is in the middle of a Super Bloom, and it is incredible. I’m making every effort I can to see as many blooming wildflowers as possible. The following images are from a visit to the Antelope Valley California Poppy Reserve in Lancaster, California. All images were taken 1 April 2019, and none have been edited. I hope you enjoy them!

All images © Lindsay Linegar 2019

More on the 2019 California Super Bloom:

Southern California in Bloom
